trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bevat de waarden die worden gebruikt als de id's voor <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Deze id's worden gebruikt door providers UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI Automation-clienttoepassingen moeten de equivalente velden in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> gebruiken

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Deze id wordt gebruikt door providers UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI Automation-clienttoepassingen moeten het overeenkomende veld in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> gebruiken

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` before allowing a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Een besturingselement moet de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>ingesteld op `true` en de bijbehorende <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty>ingesteld op `false` alvorens toe te staan een aanroep van <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Deze id wordt gebruikt door providers UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI Automation-clienttoepassingen moeten het overeenkomende veld in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> gebruiken

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: Het patroon [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] wordt doorgegeven naar methoden, zoals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>voor het ophalen van het besturingselement patroon van belang van het opgegeven UI Automation-element.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Deze id wordt gebruikt door providers UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI Automation-clienttoepassingen moeten het overeenkomende veld in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> gebruiken
